meanings.sent1: I counted up to fifty in my math class.
meanings.sent2: There are fifty stars on the American flag.
meanings.sent3: Fifty cupcakes were not enough for the hungry kids at the party.
meanings.sent4: The fifty states of the USA form a strong union.
meanings.sent5: She won fifty dollars in the raffle, making her day.

meanings.definition: A group or set of fifty people or things.
meanings.sent1: The choir had exactly fifty members singing in harmony.
meanings.sent2: There were fifty chairs set up for the big meeting.
meanings.sent3: Fifty elephants paraded through the circus tent, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: The library received a donation of fifty new books for its collection.
meanings.sent5: The team celebrated their victory with fifty high-fives all around.
